description: Create, disable, lock, enable and remove accounts.

username.description: Username of the user to be created if account did not exist.

domain.description: Domain the account is related to.

last_name.description: Last name of the user to be created if account did not exist.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

first_name.description: First name of the user to be created if account did not exist.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

timezone.description: Timezone of the user to be created if account did not exist.

password.description: Password of the user to be created if account did not exist.

email.description: Email of the user to be created if account did not exist.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.
